response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it will bring to you, I propose a special introductory price of $10,800. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the standard price. I believe this deal presents an excellent opportunity for both of us. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10800}
